roleset.name: render into pieces

example.name: transitive
example.text: In the 19th centry, companies in teh ice business would send people-1 to forzen lakes or rivers *trace*-1 to saw up the ice.

roleset.note: Frame created by Arrick. See the non-phrasal Vncls.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'saw_up' based on frame for 'chop_up. non-phrasal Verbnet entry for 'saw': cut-21.1-1, split-23.2.
